package-manager.title: GNU Texinfo Documentation System
package-manager.description: Texinfo is a documentation system that uses a single source file to produce both online information and printed output. Using texinfo, you can create a printed document with the normal features of a book, including chapters, sections, cross references, and indices. From the same texinfo source file, you can create a menu-driven, on-line info file with nodes, menus, cross references, and indices.
